data.name: Witty witch Demo
data.detailed_description:
Witty witch is a 2D puzzle platformer with handpainted graphics.
Suitable for a wide audience of all ages and preferences.
100 levels, filled with a variety of monsters will force you to show ingenuity and dexterity.
And a funny story will give motivation to reach the end.

The demo contains 15 levels.
data.about_the_game:
Witty witch is a 2D puzzle platformer with handpainted graphics.

And a funny story will give motivation to reach the end.

The demo contains 15 levels.
data.short_description: Witty witch is a 2D puzzle platformer with handpainted graphics. Suitable for a wide audience of all ages and preferences. 100 levels, filled with a variety of monsters will force you to show ingenuity and dexterity. And a funny story will give motivation to reach the end.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: GeForce 750Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: GeForce 750Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
